name: Mage Hunter
summary: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.
description:
You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit, you disrupt the spell.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
trigger: A creature within your reach Casts a Spell.
